text: The Killer Elite is a 1975 American action thriller movie directed by Sam Peckinpah and based on the Robert Syd Hopkins novel Monkey in the Middle. It stars James Caan, Robert Duvall, Burt Young, Bo Hopkins, Arthur Hill, Tiana Alexandra and it was distributed by United Artists. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1975 action movies Category:1975 thriller movies Category:American action movies Category:American thriller movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Sam Peckinpah
title: The Killer Elite
